author: bsunanda
body: There was ambiguity of depth index in earlier version. Now if StoreRadiationLength is set true, it stores # of radiation lengths in unit of ScaleRadiationLength as depth; else if StoreLayerTimeSim is set true, it stores time in units of TimeSliceUnit; else it stores 0, 1, 2 for crystal volume, primary & secondary APD volumes
title: Run2-sim08 Enabling depth studies in Ecal crystal
